nodes.text: The Betrayal of Darth Revan is an adventure for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game Saga Edition by Wizards of the Coast. It is written by Patrick Stutzman and was released at Gen Con Game Fair 2008 on August 13, 2008.

The players take control of six characters made specifically for the adventure. The group, consisting of two Jedi, a soldier, a scout, an intelligence officer, and a spy working for the Republic, travels to Sith-controlled world of Sernpidal to acquire a code cylinder for Darth Revan's flagship. After dealing with a Sith Admiral and his assault droids and getting the real code cylinder, the Republic group rendezvouses with the Republic fleet.
It is then that they are assigned to clear the way for Bastila Shan and her Jedi strike team for their attack upon Revan's flagship.

Once on board the flagship, the group clears the way for Bastila and her own team to reach the bridge, facing more assault droids and Sith-aligned commandos. They also combat Darth Voren, a Sith apprentice.
